atk-s0510a29:2_1: Ekatiṁsatime vagge paṭhamāpadāne isisaṅghe ahaṁ pubbeti ahaṁ pubbe bodhisambhārapūraṇakāle isisaṅghe
atk-s0510a29:2_2: paccekabuddhaisisamūhe tesaṁ samīpe himavantapabbate mātaṅgahatthikule vāraṇo caṇḍahatthī ahosinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a29:2_4: atha vā vācāya ravati koñcanādaṁ nadatīti vāraṇo.
atk-s0510a29:2_7: dhutarāgesu tādisūti lokadhammehi niccalesu paccekabuddhesu padmakesaraṁ padumareṇuṁ okiriṁ avasiñcinti sambandho.
atk-s0510a29:4_1: Catutthāpadāne mahābodhimaho ahūti vipassissa bhagavato catumaggañāṇādhārabhāvato “bodhī”ti laddhanāmassa rukkhassa pūjā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0510a29:4_2: Rukkhaṭṭhasseva sambuddhoti assa bodhipūjāsamaye sannipatitassa mahājanassa sambuddho lokajeṭṭho narāsabho
atk-s0510a29:4_3: rukkhaṭṭho iva rukkhe ṭhito viya paññāyatīti attho.
atk-s0510a29:4_4: Bhagavā tamhi samayeti tasmiṁ bodhipūjākaraṇakāle bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhato bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto.
atk-s0510a29:4_5: Vācāsabhimudīrayanti mudusiliṭṭhamadhurauttamaghosaṁ udīrayaṁ kathayanto nicchārento catusaccaṁ pakāsesi,
atk-s0510a29:4_7: Saṁkhittenaca desentoti veneyyapuggalajjhāsayānurūpena desento saṁkhittena ca vitthārena ca desayīti attho.
atk-s0510a29:4_11: sabbakilesā chadanā”ti evaṁ vuttā chadanā vivaṭā ugghāṭitā viddhaṁsitā anenāti vivaṭṭacchado,
atk-s0510a29:4_13: Taṁ mahājanaṁ desanāvasena nibbāpesi pariḷāhaṁ vūpasamesīti attho.
atk-s0510a29:4_14: Tassāhaṁ dhammaṁ sutvānāti tassa bhagavato desentassa dhammaṁ sutvā.
atk-s0510a29:5_1: Pañcamāpadāne phalahattho apekkhavāti vipassiṁ bhagavantaṁ disvā madhurāni phalāni gahetvā apekkhavā aturito saṇikaṁ assamaṁ gañchinti attho.
atk-s0510a29:7_1: Aṭṭhamāpadāne niṭṭhite navakamme cāti sīmāya navakamme niṭṭhaṁ gate sati.
